Package client

Class BLibClient

java.lang.Object
ocsf.client.AbstractClient
client.BLibClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class BLibClient extends ocsf.client.AbstractClient
The BLibClient class manages the communication between the client and the server. It handles the sending and receiving of messages using String-based commands.

      Controller for book search functionality. Manages general book search operations and results display.

      Controller for member menu interface. Manages navigation and functionality specific to member users.

    • memberActivityLogsController

      public static MemberActivityLogsController memberActivityLogsController
      Controller for member activity logs. Manages the tracking and display of member activities and history.

  • Constructor Details

    • BLibClient

      public BLibClient(String host, int port, ClientController clientUI) throws IOException
      Constructs an instance of the BLibClient.
      Parameters:
      host - The server to connect to.
      port - The port number to connect on.
      clientUI - The client controller instance.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs during connection.

  • Method Details

    • handleMessageFromServer

      public void handleMessageFromServer(Object message)
      Handles the message from the server and routes it to the appropriate controller.
      Parameters:
      message - The message received from the server.

    • sendMessageToServer

      public void sendMessageToServer(Object message)
      Sends a message to the server.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to send (Object format).

    • setMemberCardController

      public static void setMemberCardController(MemberCardController controller)
      Sets the static MemberCardController instance for the application. This method updates the controller reference used for member card operations.
      Parameters:
      controller - The new MemberCardController instance to be used. If null, member card operations will not be available.
      See Also:
      • MemberCardController

    • quit

      public void quit()
      Closes the client connection and terminates the program. Attempts to gracefully close the database connection before shutdown. If connection closure fails, logs the error but continues with program termination.
      See Also:
      • AbstractClient.closeConnection()

    • setLibrarianScreenController

      public static void setLibrarianScreenController(LibrarianScreenController controller)
      Sets the static LibrarianScreenController instance for the application. Updates the controller reference used for librarian-specific operations.
      Parameters:
      controller - The new LibrarianScreenController instance to be used. If null, librarian operations will not be available.
      See Also:
      • LibrarianScreenController
